website_summaries.verdict: The included carrying case and earplugs make this heated mask the perfect travel companion.
pros: Plug in the USB cord to use the heat feature, or slide in the cool gel insert to reap the cold benefits
Heat settings can be set in 10 min
increments for up to 30 min., and heat ranges from 95°F to 122°F
The removable cover makes washing your mask simple
Ships with earplugs and a convenient travel case
cons: The mask fits quite snugly, and some may find it too tight

customer_reviews.title: Better than microwaveable masks. Consistentl heat!
customer_reviews.text: I like this device. It's very well made and gives consistent heat for up to 30 minutes. I've started using the insert (heating element) directly on my eyelids underneath the mask instead of inside because it is warmer and feels better. The heating element itself is covered with a soft material so it's very comfortable. The only thing missing is an audio cue (a few beeps) when it switches off so you know you're done. I use an alarm in my phone which is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Max Power

customer_reviews.title: No more smartphone insomnia LOL
customer_reviews.text: This really helps me sleep (so I can no longer play with my phone for like an hour LOL) and relax. I use it mostly before my sleep, but I love the convience to take it on trips and bus rides with me. My commute to work is an hour plus, so have this with me is super helpful. The package also comes with a ear blocks which works wonder in blocking out sound. I have tried several brands before, but non of them gives me the portability to heat up whenever I want. Also, the heat of this eye mask spread evenly instead of one hot spot, the pricing is amazing for the quality of this product, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: okay but not the best
customer_reviews.text: This eye mask is beautifully made and packaged as well as delivered in a timely fashion. I won't be using it, however, as I have other eye masks that work much better—one for cold and another electric one for heat. The other masks I have both work better for the same reason: they sit closer to the eye for better penetration of soothing cold and therapeutic heat. My preferred heat mask is smaller and softer than this mask. A nice touch with this product was the little spray bottle that was included to facilitate the application of moist heat. This mask came with top-notch personalized customer service.
customer_reviews.author: No-me

customer_reviews.title: Great simple alternative to microwavable compresses for eye conditions.
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and is a convenient alternative to microwaveable compresses. The mask is comfortable and blocks light well. I have not used the included cooling gel insert but it seems to be of decent construction. I will note that my original unit failed after approximately 9 months. However I notified the seller of this and they immediately sent a replacement free of charge. I highly recommend this seller and product to anyone looking for a a convenient heating mask option for medical conditions or for relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect for dry eye therapy
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Easy to use, heats quickly, maintains temperature compared to the microwaveable pads, comfortable, comes with the cooling gel pad insert, washable, priced right. Con: Doesn't get hot enough, even on the highest setting. To resolve this problem, I put the valuer side on my eyes, rather than the padded side and that was a good temperature without feeling like it was burning my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: BDMelton

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but the cord should be longer. I want to sleep with it on, but the cord is too short. Also would like to see an auto timer for turning it on and off during the night. Update: 1) if you are going to market to the USA, then include Fahrenheit next to the Celsius. 2} the print on the controls are tiny. 3} USB connection, does not come with a AC power supply or a brick converter for the USB.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sleep mask. I love that you can adjust the temperature, and the length of time it is heated. It comes with the ice pack, and a little spray bottle to moisten the mask, if you choose, a drawstring bag and it even has a set of earplugs. All this comes in a nice sturdy box. The mask itself is soft and very comfortable, as well as adjustable. I have only used it a few times so far, but it works well and seems to be if good quality. I am very pleased with this purchase, I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtfully designed
customer_reviews.text: This product is brilliant and thoughtful. Eye mask is soft, everything is well-stitched, and the zipper is good quality. It comes in a nice box and includes everything... even a set of earplugs and a mini spray bottle. It gives me relief while waiting for my migraine medications to take effect. The only things I would like to be different are: 1) the cold pack to be a bit thicker so it doesn’t warm up as quickly, and 2) for there to be an extra cold pack, so that one can be cooling in the refrigerator while the other is in use.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from dry eyes and have been using the pellet/microwave type mask for the last year. Having an electric mask seemed like a wonderful idea. It is still a wonderful idea but not this one. First, it only worked with some extension cords. That wasn't too bad but the mask was only snugly touching my eyelids on the sides of my face. Then it goes up to the bridge of my nose leaving a long space barely touching my eyelids. In order to warm my whole eyelid, I must push on the mask around the nose area to hold it against my eyes. The pellet/microwave mask does not have this problem. I don't consider this purchase a success.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Timer/temp control never worked correctly
customer_reviews.text: From the very first use, the timer/temp control did not work correctly. I had to keep unplugging it and restarting the process to set the time and temp I wanted. The control would reset itself to random settings. After a couple of uses, I noticed it would not stay heated for even 10 minutes. It feels great on and works wonderfully when it actually heats up and stays heated, but it's going back to the seller today. I'll go back to using my good ol' microwavable Bruder mask.
customer_reviews.author: CCShopper

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This is great, keeps a lasting heat very well. It does seem like the area on the nose piece is very straight across so when I take it off I always have a line across my nose even though I feel I need to apply pressure on the eye area to get the heat closer to the lids
customer_reviews.author: Littlechica

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Heating element didn't stay on - mask didn't fit over my eyes properly - am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd give it a zero if it was an option
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to heat up and max heat isn't anywhere near what's advertised. I had this all of 8 hours, tried three different USB power sources and the flimsy heat pack was warm at best. Couldn't return it fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: pclund

customer_reviews.title: Simple and functional design, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved how this mask has a removable cover so it can be washed! The heat feels like a thin strip across the eyes, but it warms up the entire mask in a few minutes. I tried the highest setting and it was still comfortable (makes sense that it wouldn’t get too hot, since the eye area is sensitive). I think my favorite part of the mask is that it maintains its heat for an extended time (and it’s so useful that it has a timer option). All in all, 10/10!!!! Love this, and love that it’s supporting a small business! I’m thinking about getting these as Christmas gifts for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Px

customer_reviews.title: much better than masks you heat in the microwave
customer_reviews.text: I had been using masks that you heat in the microwave. They had to be reheated often. With these you just set the time and temperature and relax. I especially like that you I can plug them into my phone charger.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best insomnia aid
customer_reviews.text: Reduce eye bags! I have frequent insomnia due to stress, and as a result my sleep quality has been poor, and eye got puffy and has developed severe dark circles. After using it, it really help brings me to sleep without the help of sleep aid. Either because it improves my sleep quality, or the heat it expresses help reduce my eye bags, all I know is it work and I just want to say a huge thank you for that.
customer_reviews.author: zichao jiang

customer_reviews.title: Super relaxing steam eye mask
customer_reviews.text: This eye mask does a fantastic job relieving my eye tiredness. It is like having a piece of warm cotton towel on my eyes. Very comfortable and evenly heated. Love the fact that it comes with ice gel option as well, so I can use it when my eyes are a bit puff. Comes in a nice box, would be a perfect gift option for upcoming father day.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: LOOK NO FURTHER. YOU WANT THIS MASK.
customer_reviews.text: It seemed a bit intimidating to use, but I was over thinking it. If you want a mask for dry eyes then look no further. A++++ for the product, shipping time and wonderful seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I always use the highest setting for temperature and duration. I wish there was an option to use it for more than 30 min but I suppose it is that way for safety purpose. I normally fall asleep within 30 min anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Mika Nakata

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but not fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work unless you have another thick mask on top. I'm not sorry I bought it but wish I didn't have to wear another one to get the desired effect.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. East

customer_reviews.title: Best Eye Investment Ever
customer_reviews.text: After using it for almost two months, my eye issues has gotten so much better. Heat has been consistence every single time, and heat up rather quickly. I would fall asleep after using it for majority of the time because of how relaxing it is. So I can only use it during nap time or when I am ready for bed. I would highly recommend it to anyone that has eye issue, or simply need an effective way to bring you to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Fan Z.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry eyes; I purchased this for the heating element. It does not get hot enough for me, and the controls are so tiny they are almost impossible to activate.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Got them for a gift for my boyfriend, By his reaction, I will definitely be getting myself some when I have extra cash. Just an incredible product.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a now invaluable item that I use twice a day. So comfortable with adjustable temps and timer. It is definitely helping me with glands in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Krause

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So great! Easy to use on the plane too! Just plug right into the seat. Long flights that is!
customer_reviews.author: Jarrr

customer_reviews.title: Super relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the microwavable one. I always had issue with these as they can easily burn my eyelid, and could cause possible damage to my eyeball. But I don’t have to worry about that with this eye mask, and the heat options they had are perfect. For extra relief, i pour a drop of essential oil (the body safe type one) into the spray bottle, and fill it up with water. Before applying it to my eye, I simply give it few spray so it calms my whole body down. A small price to pay for such a luxurious experience.
customer_reviews.author: Shuo Liu

customer_reviews.title: Migraine Relief
customer_reviews.text: This helped a lot for my migraines! I wasn't impressed by the cold pack, but the heating pad works wonders for tired eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Helps me sleep . . . great to use before bedtime.
customer_reviews.text: This eye-mask does wonders for relaxation after a long day. If you sit in front of the computer a lot, it's also a nice way to help your eyes recover. I think it is easy to use and great quality. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie P

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of heat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent solution to my dry eyes, no irriation or itchiness like eyedrops do. The temperature is perfect for me, and the actual heating compartment is removable from the eye mask itself, so I can wash the mask regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Huang

customer_reviews.title: Nice, well-made product, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great to soothe the computer eye syndrome. Comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff to relax my eyes
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my coworkers. I work most of my days just staring at computer screens. My eyes get very warn out and tired. This eye mask really helps to relax my dry eyes at the end of my day. Good value purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: not what I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Did not even try---had to be plugged into USB port. Not convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie  in Clarkston

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My eyelid looked pregnant before using this and after two nights they swelled all the way down!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is just a great little eye mask. It’s soft on your skin, warms up fast and just feels wonderful. Well worth the money. I use it to keep my eyes moist as I have dry eyes. I use it when I first get into bed, it is so relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: janet l. fowler

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality and materials. Great settings and jeat delivery. Only critique would be if the eyepad was formed ina way to get the heat contact further into the eye socket.
customer_reviews.author: Sarai

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! This heats up to the perfect temperature where your eyeballs aren’t cooking and where your eyes are left cold. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Mango 🥭 Mai

customer_reviews.title: much samller then i expected
customer_reviews.text: its really small and dosnt make the work (becuse its small)
customer_reviews.author: nati d

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, you have sinus pain or headaches this will help with the ice picks behind the eyes and it helps relax you, it’s like spa day~
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: they don't get hot enough its not easy to use either
customer_reviews.author: Israel trejo

customer_reviews.title: It’s a little snug but otherwise it’s great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little snug on the face. My husband bought it thinking it was for migraines not beauty lol but at least he tried ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lingley

customer_reviews.title: soothing
customer_reviews.text: I am sensitive to light when sleeping and this mask not only does a good job blocking light, but it also provides a nice moist heat. This inexpensive gadget has made my naps luxurious. After working on the computer all day and suffering from dry eye symptoms, it feels great to sooth my eyes with this.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Heat? I can’t even tell when it’s turned because it barely gets. When I first received it. It’s pretty disappointing because now the window to return it has closed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just the right temperature, I like the number 2 heat setting, makes me super refreshing when waking up from a nap. Very consistence heat and way better than the microwave one.
customer_reviews.author: Chen Zan

customer_reviews.title: Great for Eye Injury / Infection
customer_reviews.text: I had a bad case of eye infection and the alternate hot /cold with this product was excellent, especially the ability to keep warm on the eye without the bulky heating pad or the wet cloth that couldn’t stay warm long enough
customer_reviews.author: natalie gerks

customer_reviews.title: Great present choice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice eye mask. Good quality. Comes in a gift box. Perfect gift for mother-in-law!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wire dislodged after a month
customer_reviews.text: Wire is dislodged from temperature keypad after one month. Return time expired. Nose padding is unnecessary. Makes it more difficult for the eye pads to hit your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Hockey

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt Work!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, while the instructions for usage were clear, this product would not work. I was travelling and missed the return window with Amazon. I would not recomend buying it. It's a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after used twice
customer_reviews.text: It was good when I first used it. However, it stopped working at the third time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Easy and comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: This works so much better than the eye masks that go in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Colleen Woodrow

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: The eye mask was recommended by my eye doctor for a genetic condition occurring in my old age {92}. I enjoy using it everyday. Puts me to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eye mask
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product because it is comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: It’s the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have dry eyes. It works for me. Easy and affordable!
customer_reviews.author: m.k

customer_reviews.title: Cured my eye from bad styes
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 bad styes in my right eye for a long time. And with this product the styes are almost gone!!! Im so thankfull for your eyemask is making me so happy
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Nice set especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, especially for the price. On the top setting, it gets very warm. Any warmer might be unsafe/unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Gotts

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect package! It includes everything I need. And the mask fabric is very soft and comfortable! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: sijichen

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I like the coolness of it when it is on my closed eyes. I have not used the warming one yet. (It looks kind of complicated to use.). Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mitsuko Rokuhira

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not too hot and so convenient. I can take it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa loch

customer_reviews.title: Overall this eye mask is really nice.
customer_reviews.text: The mask gets nice and warm and helps sooth the eyes. The freezable gel pack that comes with it is useless, it freezes solid and will not mold to your face.
customer_reviews.author: T. R.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.text: High quality product and outstanding customer service. This seller is one of the best on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: D. Runion

customer_reviews.title: Really love it.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. I like how soft and silky my skin feels.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Chiu

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my eye at night it will be better if it a little warmer. Other than that definitely recommended for somebody else
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: USB eye mask
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for dry eye. So far it has worked well. I use it when I go to bed and it turns off after the set time.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and delivery was very quick. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality, fiction and value.
customer_reviews.text: The cold pack is too hard/no’t flexible and will snap and break.
customer_reviews.author: josephine stokes

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps a peeping sound at the end of session will be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This item works perfectly... perfect distribution of heat and comfort... highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jessica kehl

customer_reviews.title: pretty useless
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get warm enough to be of any use. You are better off sticking to the microwavable eye masks.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: who doesn't love surprises
customer_reviews.text: wasn't expecting so many little gifts/tools to help! BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Tiara Russell

customer_reviews.title: Product is wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mom, who has severe dry eye and macular degeneration. She loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly relaxing
customer_reviews.text: One 20 minute session and me dry eye issue was solved.
customer_reviews.author: collin spaw

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packed. Like the small gift coming along with the mask. We tried both the warming and cooling mode. Very relaxing!
customer_reviews.author: Ziheng Deng

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate and very comfortable. Much better than the ones I've been using that require microwaving.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great product comfortable and speedy delivery
customer_reviews.text: Using it for my eyes and everything is fine thank you
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent eye pad serves multipurposes
customer_reviews.text: My sister bought this and recommended it to me. She loves hers. I have severe dry eyes. I moisten the pad and put this eye pad on for 30 minutes each night or whenever I can. So far it’s been a help. The best thing is, the warmth of the heat relaxes me and I always doze off to sleep. This serves great purpose. Also, this helps my sinuses too. A great multipurpose eye pad. Great job! I love it too. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Portable USB Hot/Cold Eye Mask
customer_reviews.text: I got done using this for the first time about an hour ago. I got it mostly for my son who's been having headaches but I tried it for fun and O.M.G.!!! My eyes feel so much better and I didn't even know they could. Lol! This thing is fabulous as long as it continues to work!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth C

customer_reviews.title: Best for warm compresses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I suffer from styes and chalazions. I hate using dripping wet hot towels or pads on my face for warm compresses to break up the clogged pores in my eyelids. This worked perfectly for helping me get rid of them. I would use this a few times a day until I didn’t need to anymore. I’m really happy I bought this and that I have it for the future.
customer_reviews.author: RY

customer_reviews.title: Great Bruder mask for traveling or off grid use
customer_reviews.text: My husband's opthalmologist recommended a Bruder mask for treatment of dry eye. Most of the other Bruder masks require a microwave. Since we're living off- grid, we don't have a microwave! This USB mask works in the truck or with a power bank. He uses the power bank to power the mask at night and it works just fine. He likes the different time and heat settings. It has helped to alleviate some of his symptoms, so it works for us!
customer_reviews.author: Vidahlia

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after three months
customer_reviews.text: I actually really liked this eye mask when i first got it and it was exactly what I needed for my dry eyes. But it broke after less than three months of using it and it will no longer heat up. I’m so disappointed because I really liked the mask. I tried returning it to Amazon but they wouldn’t let me since its is past their return window. Such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: SBon

customer_reviews.title: BEST eye mask I’ve ever used! Great value for $
customer_reviews.text: I have used this every single night for about 2 weeks. It relaxes my tired eyes and I don’t know how I’ve ever lived without it! I plug it into my portable bank charger and voila! The only thing that upsets me is that I mistakenly threw away the piece you put in the fridge, so I can only use it hot. 😞 If you’re looking for an eye mask...look no further. You will not regret getting this one. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Warms up nice
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday and used it twice. It's not too large, nice and snug, the heat is good, and yes- squirting the inside with water does give it more of a moist heat sensation. I'm using it per doc's orders for dry eye at least 20 minutes twice a day, since I just started no effect yet I don't think, but my case is severe and I just started.
customer_reviews.author: nickdxx

customer_reviews.title: Sinus relief at last!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help relieve ear pressure after a long flight. My ears never opened. This seemed to help a bit. I've found I use it even after the initial issue, because it's so soft & helps me relax. Even after it turns off I leave it on as a night mask! Husband uses it too for relaxing before bed, gonna have to buy a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use only the sleep mask as I did not feel like the heat pack got warm enough for my taste. I have not tried the cold pack but am sure it would suffice. The sleep mask is pretty small, however, and slips off of my eyes easily.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: this is amazing the heat helps me sleep so easily and helps my eyes feel so much better
customer_reviews.author: Zgriz

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: It’s good I just wish that you could have the cable on the other side as my outlet is on the opposite side of the direction the connection is so it’s a bit awkward having the wire over my head .
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I like the product.. it's easy to use, and does just what it's supposed to do. My only problem is that I can't read the little manual because the print is way too small.
customer_reviews.author: CatLady

customer_reviews.title: Really helps dry eyes.
customer_reviews.text: This has actually helped my dry eyes! I’m so pleased it has its own timer and temp control. They even included ear plugs. Only issue, I fall asleep with it on.
customer_reviews.author: R. Novak

customer_reviews.title: It is great
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this mask. It heats up nicely.. i have trouble with head straps being to tight but the head strap adjusts enough so that it is not squishing my eyes.. the cord is about 6ft long. It is a great mask.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Feels so good
customer_reviews.text: This is great for relaxing strained eyes, enabling both heat and cold compresses in the same device.
customer_reviews.author: J. Michael Jaffe

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Helps with eye inflammation. Warms up quickly, comfortable & portable. I use it daily & it’s easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery ,works great
customer_reviews.text: It's so soft and love the different times and heatings .havent tried the steam or cold pack .but the heat works good for my migraines. A upgrade for last one that finally gave out .quick delivery too!
customer_reviews.author: JEFF AND LORRIE WISEMAN

customer_reviews.title: Dry eye & migraine relief
customer_reviews.text: How did I ever get by without this eye mask? The heat + comfortable fit is welcome relief for dry, tired eyes, migraines & sinus pain
customer_reviews.author: jfree99

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I am looking for. Works great for my eye soreness, very comfortable. Absolutely a product for relax. Strongly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Really helped my tired eyes
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night - it really helps to soothe my eyes and helps me sleep

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Helps serious dry eye. Wife says she may get one for herself. Like the variable heat and time settings.
customer_reviews.author: John Friends

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Works incredibly well. Gets really hot if you want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Denis A.

customer_reviews.title: Convenience, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: All I say is it does it all. Love that it has different heating and timing levels.
customer_reviews.author: Marge Colborn

product_meta.title: Portable Cold and Hot USB Heated Steam Eye Mask + Reusable Ice Gels for Sleeping, Eye Puffiness, Dry Eye, Tired Eyes, and Eye Bag with Time and Temperature Control, Best Mother's Day Gift
feature_bullets: 【HOT or COLD】 With the included Ice Gel, along with the heated carbon fiber compress, you can choose your desire temperature ranging from icing cold to steaming heat.

【TEMPERATURE & TIME CONTROL】The mask is designed with 5 level of heat and time setting, ranging from 35 to 50 °C ( 95 to 122 °F ), and 10 to 30 minutes respectively, allowing the mask to automatically turn off as you go asleep.

【SOFT & SAFE】Internal of the eye mask is compose with soft and fluffy materials, allowing only the softest and most gentle touch to your eyes. Unlike traditional microwave eye mask, this eye mask has been heavily tested during development to prevent the possibility of over-heating damage.

【PORTABLE & ECO-FRIENDLY】Easily powered it by power bank, USB wall adapter, laptop. You can travel with it everything using the included carrying case. It is also much more economical than the disposable one-time steaming eye mask.
【WASHABLE】The heated compress can be easily removed from the eye mask’s exterior cover, allowing you to clean it easily.
